name: Vector
description: Vector is a lightweight tool for building observability pipelines. (With easy setup for CloudWatch!)

VECTOR_TOML_URL.description: The URL of the `vector.toml` you use to use. (Refreshed on restart! For static, provision a `vector.toml` with your app.)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: An AWS key ID (if needed, for sinking to CloudWatch)

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: An AWS access key (if needed, for sinking to CloudWatch)

AWS_REGION.description: An AWS region (if needed, for sinking to CloudWatch). Examples: `ca-central-1`, `us-east-1`

AWS_CLOUDWATCH_STREAM_NAME.description: An AWS CloudWatch stream name (if needed, for sinking to CloudWatch. Vector can create this for you.)

AWS_CLOUDWATCH_GROUP_NAME.description: An AWS CloudWatch stream group name (if needed, for sinking to CloudWatch. You need to create this yourself.)

LOGPLEX_SOURCE_HTTPS_USERNAME.description: An autogenerating username. (Use this to add your drain later!)

LOGPLEX_SOURCE_HTTPS_PASSWORD.description: An autogenerating password. (Use this to add your drain later!)
